statements: SELECT * FROM user_behavior_patterns WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT behavior_description, location FROM user_behavior_patterns WHERE threat_level > 5;
SELECT timestamp, behavior_description FROM user_behavior_patterns WHERE location = 'Office' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, threat_level FROM user_behavior_patterns WHERE behavior_description LIKE '%malicious%' ORDER BY threat_level ASC;
SELECT user_id, behavior_description, location FROM user_behavior_patterns WHERE threat_level BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT * FROM user_behavior_patterns WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, behavior_description FROM user_behavior_patterns WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, location, threat_level FROM user_behavior_patterns WHERE threat_level >= 5 AND location='Office';
SELECT user_id, MAX(timestamp) AS last_activity FROM user_behavior_patterns GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_behaviors FROM user_behavior_patterns GROUP BY location HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_behaviors DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT user_id, username, last_login FROM users ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE last_login IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM users JOIN user_activities ON users.user_id = user_activities.user_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM user_activities WHERE activity_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT username, email, last_login FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM login_attempts ORDER BY attempt_time DESC;
SELECT attempt_id, user_id, success FROM login_attempts WHERE success = false ORDER BY attempt_time;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS total_users FROM user_profiles;
SELECT user_id, last_login FROM user_profiles ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT user_id, log_time, log_description FROM security_logs WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY log_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_accounts ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, password FROM user_accounts WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM login_attempts WHERE success = TRUE AND attempt_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, action, access_time FROM access_logs ORDER BY access_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT log_id, user_id, access_time FROM access_logs ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, action FROM access_logs WHERE action = 'Login' AND access_time > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT user_id, event_type FROM access_logs JOIN security_events ON access_logs.log_id = security_events.log_id WHERE event_type LIKE '%failure%';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, activity_type FROM activities ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM threats WHERE user_id = 3 AND threat_level > 5;
SELECT user_id, action_time FROM security_logs WHERE action_type = 'login' AND user_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM activities ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM threats WHERE threat_level > 5 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT u.username, l.attempt_time, l.success FROM users u JOIN login_attempts l ON u.user_id = l.user_id;
